sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_agent_76ff52cc15ec32107f44c234ba329a72
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent"><sn_aia_agent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>This agent is used to calculate delay costs for delivery issues when a truck breaks down. When a Delivery Delay record is created with the status set to "pending", the agent looks at all the proposed routes and calculates how much each delay would cost based on the customer's contract. It then saves the financial impact as JSON in the record and creates an incident for tracking the issue.</description><instructions>First, perform Financial Impact Analysis. Second, create Delayed Delivery incident. Third, update the Delivery Delay record with the calculated impact.
Step 1: Use the Pull Delivery Delay Record Tool with the Route ID the user entered. If no Route ID is provided, find the earliest created record with status pending. Retrieve its eta_minutes values for each proposed route.
2. Use the Customer ID value of the Delayed Delivery to Locate the Supply Agreement for the Customer. Store the numerical value Customer's Delivery Window Hours and numerical value for Stockout Penalty Rate in memory.
FINANCIAL ANALYSIS INSTRUCTIONS 3. Calculate the financial impact with the Financial Impact tool.
Use the Route ID, Customer Name, Problem Description, and Calculated Impact stored in memory to create the Delayed Delivery Incident record. In the Incident Description, insert a line break between {{problem_description}} and {{calculated_impact}}. Store the created Incident's Sys ID in memory.
Update the Delivery Delay record that matches the user provided Route ID with the Calculated Impact and the Incident Sys ID.</instructions><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Route Financial Analysis Agent</internal_name><name>Route Financial Analysis Agent</name><proficiency>- The agent is proficient in using Route IDs to locate delivery delay records, perform financial impact calculations for each proposed route, create incident records, and update delivery records with calculated impacts. - The agent follows a systematic action plan to first perform financial impact analysis, then create a delayed delivery incident, and finally update the delivery delay record with the calculated impact. - The agent uses the 'Supply Agreement Lookup' tool to access the customer's supply agreement, obtaining delivery window hours and stockout penalty rate, which are vital for calculating the financial impact of delivery delays. - The agent employs the 'Financial Impact Calculator' tool to compute the dollar impact for each route option when a delivery is delayed, utilizing inputs such as delivery window hours, stockout penalty rate, and proposed routes. - The agent integrates the 'Supply Agreement Lookup' and 'Financial Impact Calculator' tools to perform detailed financial impact analyses, leveraging customer-specific data to enhance accuracy and reliability.</proficiency><record_type>custom</record_type><role>This agent's job is to use the Route ID to find the record, then perform a financial impact calculation for each proposed route when a delivery is delayed. Then create an incident record, finally update the status of Delivery Record to "CALCULATED".</role><run_as/><strategy display_value="ReAct">f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74</strategy><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-08 01:22:25</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>76ff52cc15ec32107f44c234ba329a72</sys_id><sys_mod_count>43</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Route Financial Analysis Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_76ff52cc15ec32107f44c234ba329a72</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-09 17:59:12</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_agent></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_1a472ecc152072107f44c234ba329a6d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Calculates the dollar impact for each route option when a delivery is delayed.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"delivery_window_hours","description":"Numerical value for delivery_window_hours"},{"name":"stockout_penalty_rate","description":"Numerical value for stockout_penalty_rate"},{"name":"proposed_routes","description":"proposed routes"}]</input_schema><name>Financial Impact Calculator</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // inputs expected: eta_minutes, delivery_window_hours, stockout_penalty_rate
    var deliveryWindow = inputs.delivery_window_hours * 60;
    var penaltyRate = inputs.stockout_penalty_rate / 60;
    var routes = JSON.parse(inputs.proposed_routes);
    var impacts = [];


    for (var r in routes) {
        var exceeded_minutes = routes[r]['eta_minutes'] - deliveryWindow;
        var cost = exceeded_minutes > 0 ? exceeded_minutes * penaltyRate : 0;
        impacts.push({
            option_id: routes[r]['option_id'],
            route_number: routes[r]['route_number'],
            distance_miles: routes[r]['distance_miles'],
            eta_minutes: routes[r]['eta_minutes'],
            impact: '$' + (cost).toFixed(2)
            
    
        });

    }
    return impacts;

})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-08 01:43:26</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>1a472ecc152072107f44c234ba329a6d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Financial Impact Calculator</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_1a472ecc152072107f44c234ba329a6d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-09 18:21:15</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_ba1a9344152872107f44c234ba329a7d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Pulls record from the Delivery Delay table with the user provided route id</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"route_id"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Pull Delivery Delay Record</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-08 05:25:27</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>ba1a9344152872107f44c234ba329a7d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Pull Delivery Delay Record</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_ba1a9344152872107f44c234ba329a7d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-08 06:30:15</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</inputs><max_auto_executions>10</max_auto_executions><name>Supply Agreement Lookup</name><output_transformation_strategy>none</output_transformation_strategy><run_as/><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-08 01:43:25</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>1647ea0c152072107f44c234ba329ade</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Supply Agreement Lookup</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m_1647ea0c152072107f44c234ba329ade</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-08 05:04:02</sys_updated_on><tool display_value="Supply Agreement Lookup">5e47ea0c152072107f44c234ba329ada</tool></sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_92472ecc152072107f44c234ba329a73
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Updates the delivery delay record with calculated impact.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"route id"},{"name":"incident_sys_id","description":"created incident sys id"},{"name":"calculated_impact","description":"updated calculated impact"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Update Delivery Delay Record</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // update script

    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    // parses query expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (expression === "") return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName].toLowerCase();
            }
            return match;
        });
    }

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contain that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ? inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues : [];
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs)
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    var updatedRecords = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;

    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }

    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        if (gr.canWrite()) {
            fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
                if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                    gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
                }
            });
            gr.update();
            updatedRecords.push(gr.getValue('sys_id'));
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }

    }
    var updated = updatedRecords.length;
    var total = updatedRecords.length + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records updated in the {2} table.",
        [updated.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "updatedRecords": updatedRecords,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-08 01:43:26</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>92472ecc152072107f44c234ba329a73</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Delivery Delay Record</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_92472ecc152072107f44c234ba329a73</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-08 05:04:02</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_ba08fe4415e072107f44c234ba329aab
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Sends the final routing decision to n8n for external execution. The script builds the payload and posts it to the webhook URL.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"route id"}]</input_schema><name>Trigger Webhook</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // Configuration - Set webhook URL here
    var WEBHOOK_URL = 'https://rhyannag28.app.n8n.cloud/webhook-test/2c706d1b-b170-4e77-b871-cf8e1ecc0d52'

    try {
        var routeId = inputs.route_id;
        if (!routeId) {
            return {
                success: 'false',
                message: 'Route ID is required',
                route_id: 'not_provided',
            };
        }

        // Get the delivery delay record to include additional context
        var delayGr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay');
        delayGr.addQuery('route_id', routeId);
        delayGr.query();

        if (!delayGr.next()) {
            return {
                success: 'false',
                message: 'Delivery delay record not found for route: ' + routeId,
                route_id: routeId,
            };
        }

        var delaySysId = delayGr.getUniqueValue();
        var truckId = delayGr.getValue('truck_id');
        var chosenOptionJson = delayGr.getValue('chosen_option');

        gs.info('N8N Webhook: Found delivery delay record, sys_id=' + delaySysId);

        // Parse chosen_option JSON if it's stored as string
        var chosenOption;
        try {
            chosenOption =
                typeof chosenOptionJson === 'string' ?
                JSON.parse(chosenOptionJson) :
                chosenOptionJson;
        } catch (e) {
            return {
                success: 'false',
                message: 'Failed to parse chosen_option JSON: ' + e.message,
                route_id: routeId,
            };
        }

        // Prepare webhook payload matching your expected format
        var webhookPayload = {
            route_id: routeId,
            truck_id: truckId,
            chosen_option: chosenOption,
        };

        // Make API call to N8N webhook
        var request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
        request.setEndpoint(WEBHOOK_URL);
        request.setHttpMethod('POST');
        request.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
        request.setRequestHeader('Accept', 'application/json');

        var requestBody = JSON.stringify(webhookPayload);
        request.setRequestBody(requestBody);

        var startTime = new Date().getTime();
        var response = request.execute();
        var endTime = new Date().getTime();
        var responseTime = endTime - startTime;

        var httpStatusCode = response.getStatusCode();
        var responseBody = response.getBody();
        var errorMessage = response.getErrorMessage();
        var isSuccess = httpStatusCode >= 200 && httpStatusCode < 300;

        gs.info(
            'N8N Webhook: API Response - Status: ' +
            httpStatusCode +
            ', Body: ' +
            responseBody
        );

        return {
            success: isSuccess.toString(),
            message: isSuccess ?
                'N8N workflow triggered successfully! Route ' +
                routeId +
                ' execution initiated. Response time: ' +
                responseTime +
                'ms' :
                'Webhook failed - HTTP ' +
                httpStatusCode +
                ': ' +
                (errorMessage || responseBody),
            route_id: routeId,
            truck_id: truckId,
            chosen_option: JSON.stringify(chosenOption),
            http_status: httpStatusCode.toString(),
            response_time_ms: responseTime.toString(),
            webhook_url: WEBHOOK_URL,
        };
    } catch (e) {
        var errorMsg = 'Exception in N8N webhook call: ' + e.message;
        gs.error('N8N Webhook error: ' + errorMsg);

        return {
            success: 'false',
            message: errorMsg,
            route_id: inputs.route_id || 'unknown',
            webhook_url: WEBHOOK_URL,
        };
    }
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-08 02:56:38</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>ba08fe4415e072107f44c234ba329aab</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Trigger Webhook</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_ba08fe4415e072107f44c234ba329aab</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-10 00:35:01</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_5e47ea0c152072107f44c234ba329ada
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Looks up the customer’s supply agreement to get the delivery window and penalty rate for delay calculations.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"customer_id","description":"customer id from the delivery delay record"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Supply Agreement Lookup</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-08 01:43:25</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>5e47ea0c152072107f44c234ba329ada</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Supply Agreement Lookup</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_5e47ea0c152072107f44c234ba329ada</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-08 05:04:02</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_b608fe4415e072107f44c234ba329ab1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Updates the related incident’s priority to 1 after a high-penalty route is chosen.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Escalate Incident Priority</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // update script

    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    // parses query expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (expression === "") return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName].toLowerCase();
            }
            return match;
        });
    }

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contain that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ? inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues : [];
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs)
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    var updatedRecords = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;

    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }

    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        if (gr.canWrite()) {
            fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
                if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                    gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
                }
            });
            gr.update();
            updatedRecords.push(gr.getValue('sys_id'));
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }

    }
    var updated = updatedRecords.length;
    var total = updatedRecords.length + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records updated in the {2} table.",
        [updated.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "updatedRecords": updatedRecords,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-08 02:56:38</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>b608fe4415e072107f44c234ba329ab1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Escalate Incident Priority</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_b608fe4415e072107f44c234ba329ab1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-08 02:56:38</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>sn_aia_tool</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_3608fe4415e072107f44c234ba329aa0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Compares each proposed route’s penalty and selects the lowest-cost option.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"calculated_impact","description":"calculated impact"},{"name":"route_id","description":"route id"}]</input_schema><name>Pick Best Route</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    var route_id = inputs.route_id;
    var lowest = Infinity;
    var index = 0;
    var impactArray = JSON.parse(inputs.calculated_impact);

    for (var x in impactArray) {
        var current = parseFloat(impactArray[x]['impact'].slice(1));
        if (current < lowest) {
            lowest = current;
            index = x;
            continue;
        }
        if (current === lowest) {
            var lowest_miles = impactArray[index]['distance_miles'];
            var curr_miles = impactArray[x]['distance_miles'];
            lowest = curr_miles < lowest_miles ? current : lowest;
            index = curr_miles < lowest_miles ? x : index;

        }
    }

    var gr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay');
    gr.addQuery('route_id', route_id);
    gr.query();
    if (gr.next()) {
        var incident_sys_id = gr.getValue('incident_sys_id');
        gr.setValue('status', 'approved');
        gr.setValue('chosen_option', JSON.stringify(impactArray[index]));
        gr.update();
    }
    var incident_gr = new GlideRecord('incident');
    incident_gr.addQuery('sys_id', incident_sys_id);
    incident_gr.query();
    if (incident_gr.next()) {
        if (lowest <= 0.00) {
            incident_gr.setValue('impact', 3);
            incident_gr.setValue('urgency', 2);
            incident_gr.update();
        } else if (lowest >= 0.00 && lowest <= 500) {
            incident_gr.setValue('impact', 2);
            incident_gr.setValue('urgency', 2);
            incident_gr.update();
        } else {
            incident_gr.setValue('impact', 1);
            incident_gr.setValue('urgency', 1);
            incident_gr.update();
        }
    }
    return;


})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-08 02:56:38</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>3608fe4415e072107f44c234ba329aa0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Pick Best Route</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_3608fe4415e072107f44c234ba329aa0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-09 18:54:29</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_dd69f24815e072107f44c234ba329a00
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Creates a new incident when a delivery delay is detected and links it to the delay.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"route id"},{"name":"calculated_impact","description":"formatted calculated impact"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Create Incident for Delay</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM.   
    // create script
    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ?
        inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues :
        [];

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contains that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    // each field is passed as an {id, label} obj to be displayed when editing the tool
    // each value is not passed directly, but in an object containing the fieldValue prop
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs),
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (gr.canCreate()) {
        gr.initialize();
        fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
            if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
            }
        });
    } else {
        return {
            output: gs.getMessage(
                "Cannot create record due to security constraints."
            ),
        };
    }
    var sysId = gr.insert();

    if (!sysId) {
        gs.error(gs.getMessage("[AIA AGENTS MSG] Failed to insert the record."));
        return {
            output: gs.getMessage("Failed to insert the record")
        };
    }
    return {
        sysId: sysId,
        message: gs.getMessage("Record successfully inserted into the {0} table.", [tableName]),
        status: "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-08 03:02:32</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>dd69f24815e072107f44c234ba329a00</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create Incident for Delay</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_dd69f24815e072107f44c234ba329a00</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-08 05:04:02</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_agent_8d0926c0156072107f44c234ba329a63
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent"><sn_aia_agent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>This agent figures out the best route to send the delivery based on how much each delay would cost. It looks at penalty impacts and picks the one that’s cheapest and still meets timing requirements. Once it chooses, it updates the record and sends the info to the system that handles the actual delivery.</description><instructions>You will be provided with the route id.
1. Use the provided route id to Pull Delivery Delay Details. 2. Pass the calculated impact and the proposed routes into the Pick Best Route tool. - Select the option with the lowest penalty cost while still meeting delivery requirements. - Store this option as the chosen route. 3. Update the Delivery Delay record by saving the chosen route and changing the status to "approved." 4. Call the "Trigger Webhook" tool to send the chosen route and status update to n8n 5. Confirm that execution is complete and log the decision.</instructions><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Route Decision Agent</internal_name><name>Route Decision Agent</name><proficiency>- The agent is proficient in evaluating and selecting the optimal delivery route based on pre-calculated cost and delivery impact data, ensuring the chosen route minimizes penalties while meeting delivery time constraints. - The agent can pull delivery delay details using the 'Get Delivery Delay' tool, which includes looking up the delivery delay record, proposed routes, and financial impact details using the route id. - The agent utilizes the 'Pick Best Route' tool to analyze each proposed route's penalty and selects the option with the lowest cost that still meets delivery requirements. - The agent is capable of updating the delivery delay record by saving the chosen route and changing the status to 'approved', ensuring that the decision is properly recorded. - The agent uses the 'Trigger Webhook' tool to send the chosen route and status update to n8n, facilitating external execution and integration with other systems. - The agent confirms that execution is complete and logs the decision, providing a record of the actions taken and ensuring transparency in the decision-making process.</proficiency><record_type>custom</record_type><role>Responsible for evaluating available route options for a delayed delivery. The agent uses cost and delivery impact data calculated earlier to decide the best route. It should follow logic that picks the option with the lowest penalty, while also meeting any delivery time limits.</role><run_as/><strategy display_value="ReAct">f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74</strategy><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-08 01:53:34</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>8d0926c0156072107f44c234ba329a63</sys_id><sys_mod_count>27</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Route Decision Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_8d0926c0156072107f44c234ba329a63</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-21 03:44:51</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_agent></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_3035174815e472107f44c234ba329a20
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Use the route id to search the delivery delay table</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"route id"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Pull Delivery Delay Record</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-08 05:04:02</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>3035174815e472107f44c234ba329a20</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Pull Delivery Delay Record</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_3035174815e472107f44c234ba329a20</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-08 05:20:27</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_usecase_3a5eb50015e832107f44c234ba329a01
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_usecase"><sn_aia_usecase action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><base_plan>When a Delivery Delay record is created with status = pending:
1)Trigger the Financial Analysis Agent to pull the delay details, look up the customer’s supply agreement, and calculate financial penalties for each proposed route.
2)Trigger the Route Decision Agent to compare penalties and distances, select the best route, and update the Delivery Delay record.
3)Escalate urgency on the linked incident if penalties exceed defined thresholds.
4)Call the Trigger Webhook script to send the chosen route and status update to n8n
5)Confirm completion by updating the Delivery Delay record status to dispatched.</base_plan><description>This use case automates the resolution of delivery delays by leveraging AI agents in ServiceNow. It evaluates breakdown notifications, calculates penalty impacts using customer contracts, selects the optimal rerouting option, and coordinates execution with external systems through n8n.</description><execution_mode>copilot</execution_mode><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Supply Chain Delivery Delay Resolution</internal_name><name>Supply Chain Delivery Delay Resolution</name><record_type>custom</record_type><sys_class_name>sn_aia_usecase</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 22:45:02</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>3a5eb50015e832107f44c234ba329a01</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Supply Chain Delivery Delay Resolution</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_usecase_3a5eb50015e832107f44c234ba329a01</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-21 03:50:50</sys_updated_on><team display_value="test">dd7eb50015e832107f44c234ba329a23</team><version>v1</version></sn_aia_usecase></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_be08fe4415e072107f44c234ba329aa5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Saves the selected route and decision back to the original delivery delay record.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Update Chosen Route</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // update script

    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    // parses query expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (expression === "") return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName].toLowerCase();
            }
            return match;
        });
    }

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contain that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ? inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues : [];
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs)
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    var updatedRecords = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;

    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }

    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        if (gr.canWrite()) {
            fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
                if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                    gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
                }
            });
            gr.update();
            updatedRecords.push(gr.getValue('sys_id'));
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }

    }
    var updated = updatedRecords.length;
    var total = updatedRecords.length + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records updated in the {2} table.",
        [updated.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "updatedRecords": updatedRecords,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-08 02:56:38</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>be08fe4415e072107f44c234ba329aa5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Chosen Route</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_be08fe4415e072107f44c234ba329aa5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-08 02:56:38</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>sn_aia_tool</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Looks up the delivery delay record including proposed routes and financial impact details.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"route id"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Get Delivery Delay</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-08 02:56:38</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>a608fa8c15a072107f44c234ba329ad1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Delivery Delay</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">617634c8152032107f44c234ba329ac1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_a608fa8c15a072107f44c234ba329ad1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-09 16:40:43</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>
